name: The gloves of the Magi *dark aura*
data: It decreases the users strength a tiny bit.
It decreases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution unnoticably.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has low armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than average.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'channel power'.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'summon'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'damage analysis'.
